title: Summer Blood Drive
details: Join us for our annual summer blood drive and help save lives. Every donation counts!

title: Back to School Blood Donation
details: Give the gift of life before heading back to school. Your blood donation can make a difference in someone's life.

title: Heroes Blood Donation Marathon
details: Be a hero and donate blood at our marathon event. Together, we can save lives and make a positive impact on the community.

title: Autumn Blood Donation Drive
details: Join us for our autumn blood donation drive and help make a difference in the lives of those in need.

title: Giving Thanks Blood Donation Event
details: Give thanks and give back by donating blood at our special Thanksgiving event. Your donation can help save lives.
